query:
-- ESG Rating Thresholds Table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS esg_rating_thresholds (
    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    version INT NOT NULL,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    thresholdType ENUM('letter_grade', 'zone', 'fci_letter_grade', 'fci_zone') NOT NULL,
    thresholds TEXT NOT NULL,
    isDefault INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
    isActive INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
    createdBy INT,
    createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    INDEX idx_threshold_type_version (thresholdType, version),
    INDEX idx_threshold_active (isActive)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS esg_rating_thresholds (
    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    version INT NOT NULL,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    thresholdType ENUM('letter_grade', 'zone', 'fci_letter_grade', 'fci_zone') NOT NULL,
    thresholds TEXT NOT NULL,
    isDefault INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
    isActive INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
    createdBy INT,
    createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    INDEX idx_threshold_type_version (thresholdType, version),
    INDEX idx_threshold_active (isActive)
);
